sentences.en: Bennett launched a crusade for "moral values" against decadent "liberal relativism."
sentences.cn: 贝内特发起了一场捍卫“道德价值”、反对腐朽堕落的“自由相对论”的战争。

sentences.en: Bullfighting was left with the new decadent method, the almost impossible technique.
sentences.cn: 他们留给斗牛事业的遗产是:堕落的新方法令人生厌的技艺.

sentences.en: Bullfighting was left with the new decadent method.
sentences.cn: 他们留给斗牛事业的遗产是:堕落的新方法.

sentences.en: Decadent be kind of mentation return kind of life condition?
sentences.cn: 颓废是种心理状态还种生活状态?

sentences.en: Don't let decadent ideas eat into yourselves.
sentences.cn: 别让颓废的思想侵蚀你们.

sentences.en: I don't like the decadent opinion in the article.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢这篇文章里颓废的观点.

sentences.en: It was suppressed in the early 1920 s, stamped as " decadent " and " individualist. "
sentences.cn: 它于20年代初被指责为 “ 颓废 ” 和 “ 个人主义 ” 而遭查禁.

sentences.en: Not long after, we see the decadent Tucheng wall.
sentences.cn: 没过多久, 就看到了土城的颓壁残垣.

sentences.en: Of course, this will bring some decadent capitalist influences into China.
sentences.cn: 当然, 会带来一些资本主义的腐朽的东西.

sentences.en: Pop music was condemned as decadent and crude.
sentences.cn: 流行音乐被指责为堕落而又粗俗。

sentences.en: The decadent downtown section was once a flourishing business district.
sentences.cn: 式微的闹区地段一度曾是繁华的商业区.

sentences.en: The head waiter's eye fell upon his frayed trousers and decadent shoes.
sentences.cn: 侍者领班的眼光就落到了他的旧裤子和破皮鞋上.

sentences.en: The more decadent I am , the more hurt I suffer.
sentences.cn: 再颓废也只会令自己更受伤.

sentences.en: The Salom é that he characterized is beautiful, sexy, dangerous and decadent.
sentences.cn: 他笔下的沙乐美,是美艳 、 性感 、 危险、颓废的.

sentences.en: There is always a depressing and decadent tinge to these pictures.
sentences.cn: 他们的照片总是有一种压抑和堕落的色调在里面.

sentences.en: This song was once banned, because it was regarded as decadent.
sentences.cn: 这首歌曾经被认定为是靡靡之音而被禁止播放.

trans.tran_cn: 堕落的，颓废的，文艺颓废期的，颓废派的，衰微的
trans.tran_en: having low moral standards and being more concerned with pleasure than serious matters
